amendment.description: An amendment to reduce total amounts appropriated in the bill by $1.305 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 14 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce total amounts appropriated in the bill by $1.305 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jordan amendment (A026) Failed by recorded vote: 129 - 301 (Roll no. 522).
